entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Fog patches dissipating early this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 06 February 2023
